characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings,  Words of Radiance (mentioned), Rhythm of War

characterDescription: Restares is an Alethi Brightlord and the presumed leader of the Sons of Honor, a group which seeks to bring the Heralds back to Roshar. He is working with Amaram and advised him to steal both the Shardplate and Shardblade that Kaladin had won in killing the Shardbearer, Helaran. King Gavilar mentioned him as a potential suspect behind his assassination before Szeth revealed that the Parshendi had employed the Assassin in White instead.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is a short man with thinning hair.
characterDetails.History:
Mraize is aware of Restares, and that both the Ghostbloods and the Sons had been competing for information about Urithiru for some time.
Following the creation of the Everstorm, Restares receives a letter, written in glyphs, from Amaram:
He is the man Mraize sends Veil to find - and, she suspects, the man he wanted her to kill - plus, he's one of the Heralds.
